executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Focus on debugging and edge case testing for items #2 and #3:

For TC001 (parseExcelFile):
- Test with NaN values in academic_score field (e.g., "abc", "", undefined)
- Test with invalid behavior type strings (e.g., "행동(3)" without minus sign)
- Test with missing required fields (name, gender)
- Test with special characters in student names
- Verify that NaN scores are converted to default value 500

For TC002 (loadProject):
- Test loading with missing required fields in students array
- Test loading with invalid student IDs in avoid_ids/keep_ids (referential integrity)
- Test loading with group_ids that don't exist in groups array
- Test loading with corrupted/malformed JSON structure
- Test loading empty arrays for students/groups

These tests should verify defensive coding and graceful error handling.
